_header: Materia of learning is the book of sothfastness nailed to the tree
Subjects: Christ, Passion of; Christ, lament to
_description: The two matters of learning and of mourning — one long couplet

ArrBM184.Transcription:
Materia of lernyng ys þe bok of sothfastnes nayled to þe
                    treMateria of mornyng ys þe same bok defoylet þat fayre was &
                    bryȝt of ble
ArrBM184.Attributed Title: Materiam of lernyng & materiam of mornyng (f. 1va)
